reviewText: I got this as a gag gift for my boyfriend. His remarks : Fabio deserves an Oscar!  Very very humorous.

I ordered this as a joke for a girlfriend and this ended up being one of the funniest thing's i've ever seen. Its 30 minutes of Fabio trying to act as a viking, a pirate, and a 1920's wealthy man all while speaking in the exact same accent. Pure joy for those who  are in the mood to enjoy a nice glass of wine and laugh your a$$ off.

Warning: I am a HUGE Fabio fan, always have been, always will be.  Whenever he was on the cover of a romance novel, I always checked it out, especially the magnificent historical artwork.  Yes, I am biased, so this will be a review of shameless squee...

"ATFR" stars Fabio in three scenarios as the hero of an insomniac romance author's next book--Viking warrior, pirate, and Italian count(my favorite is the Viking!).  At approximately 40 minutes(will somebody PLEASE put this on DVD?)the tape is perfect for a break, and it's always left me smiling.

Romance fans, this is a definite MUST.  Buy it.  You'll thank me.

A true sense of romanticism and mysticism brought together for an eruption of pleasure. Fabio redifines hero for the masses. The way he holds women in his arms, stares, and speaks becomes synonymous with fire. The picuture on the VHS box with the sexy woman is, in a word, magical. A gem for those who believe.
I never really thought much about Fabio until I saw this video.  Fabio not only can act, he is super hot.  The only thing wrong was the video ended way to soon.  I Definitly recommend this video.
Unintentionally HILARIOUS, but also totally HOT -- this video is a MUST BUY, even if you aren't a fan of Fabio! Highly recommended... please, just trust me on this.
If you thought Fabio could model, wait until you see him in action!! This hottie can act, and he ain't too hard on the eyes.
